text.text: There's hot shower is a plus but very weak stream of water. Buffet style breakfast is a plus. No wifi but cell phone provider coverage are quite strong.

originalText.text: There's hot shower is a plus but very weak stream of water. Buffet style breakfast is a plus. No wifi but cell phone provider coverage are quite strong.

text.text: Service and amenities are so-so for the price offered. But one of the best option we can have in Banjar area. One room for two, but usable for three, just need to pay extra fee for breakfast in the resto area (25k). Unfortunately there are impolite guests here and there. Smoking in front of our room and talking loudly, until I have to tell them to go.

text.text: Proper place for short time stay especially for goods distributors, overnight stay etc. It has rather cheap rate and proportional facilities such as hot water shower and mini restaurant. Guests may make their own hot drinks with hot water dispenser provided in the main lobby.

text.text:
Nowhere was written, that hotel has only smokers rooms. The smell was terrible, but we had already booked it. We tried to get our money back, but they did not give a refund. We drove away.

If you are a non smoker, or you don't like rooms, where you can only smell cigarettes, then this is not a hotel for you.

text.text:
Affordable, quite comfortable, there is a swimming pool, quite large parking in the back area, near the market, square and mosque. Maybe what needs to be improved is the AC (not cold enough) and the water heater (running out of warm water on the 1st floor).

Overall, recommended 👍

originalText.text:
Affordable, quite comfort, ada kolam renang, parkiran lumayan besar di area belakang, dekat pasar, alun2 dan masjid. Mungkin yg perlu ditingkatkan, adalah AC (kurang dingin) dan water heater (kehabisan air hangat di lantai 1).

Overall, recommended 👍

text.text: although it is a hotel in a small city its a good hotel to stay for a few days, i have stayed here twice, the first impression when i came was good bcs the rooms looks like a classic old hotel, but the maintenance back then (2021) wasnt that good, a few places has dust here and there and i cant play the tv, the wifi wasnt that good too, but the second time i came it was allclean, I can play the tv and the wifi connects well! i just want to give some advice on the food, it is a bit salty, hope you can fix it.

originalText.text: although it is a hotel in a small city its a good hotel to stay for a few days, i have stayed here twice, the first impression when i came was good bcs the rooms looks like a classic old hotel, but the maintenance back then (2021) wasnt that good, a few places has dust here and there and i cant play the tv, the wifi wasnt that good too, but the second time i came it was allclean, I can play the tv and the wifi connects well! i just want to give some advice on the food, it is a bit salty, hope you can fix it.

text.text:
Quite nice hotel in small city like Banjar.
Located in the central of the city, this hotel is easy to reached.
I stayed for a night on their executive room for 380k (breakfast included). Little bit pricey, honestly, even though they offer spacious room and spacious bathroom with hot water.
But in other side, the room was clean, towel and bed also nice.
The only problem was their WiFi only good

editorialSummary.text: Unpretentious hotel offering Wi-Fi & parking, plus a rooftop terrace with pagoda-inspired gazebos.

text.text: A budget hotel in roadside location.  Spacious parking in the rear building, even though looks little in front. Clean room and bathroom. No breakfast in the restaurant and no coffee-tea & kettle in the room. A friendly service. I got water problem but it was fixed soon. For budget class hotel, it is quite good.

originalText.text: A budget hotel in roadside location.  Spacious parking in the rear building, even though looks little in front. Clean room and bathroom. No breakfast in the restaurant and no coffee-tea & kettle in the room. A friendly service. I got water problem but it was fixed soon. For budget class hotel, it is quite good.

text.text: SCAM. Owner uses apps to sell rooms then asks for extra payments. Other reviewers tell same story CAUTION. Dishonest guy who behaves friendly to steal. Rooms damp with leaking plumbing. Swimming pool used as fish farm. Rats....

originalText.text: SCAM. Owner uses apps to sell rooms then asks for extra payments. Other reviewers tell same story CAUTION. Dishonest guy who behaves friendly to steal. Rooms damp with leaking plumbing. Swimming pool used as fish farm. Rats....

text.text:
In general,
- T4 is quite quiet, because it is in a residential complex, so in the afternoon you usually meet local residents,
- Mr. Haji is friendly,
- price can be negotiated,,
- the room has AC,
- t4 sleep like at home.,
- Access is a bit of a hallway, but you can walk in
- Access anywhere, deck,
- Currently the pond has become a fish pond, it's okay so there's entertainment.
- If you go to Banjar again, definitely stay here.
- there is a kitchen for cooking yourself

originalText.text:
Secara umum,
- T4 nya cukup tenang, karena berada di kompleks pemukiman warga,, jadi kalau sore2 biasa berjumpa dengan warga setempat,
- pak Haji nya ramah,
- harga bisa dinego,,
- kamar nya ber Ac,
- t4 tidur nya layak nya dirumah sendiri.,
- akses nya agak masuk lorong, tp bisa jalan kaki masuk
- akses kemana mana dekket,
- saat ini kolam nya udah jadi kolam ikan.,gpp seh jadi ada hiburan.
- kalau satu saat ke banjar lagi pasti nginap disini aja.,
- ada dapur buat masak sendiri

text.text: A bit of good advice is to always check the cleanliness level of the toilet, for rooms that are very good according to standards. And maybe because OYO takes a really long time, the booking and payment process doesn't go directly into the partner system, so I have to wait until there is verification that the payment has been received. To the owner, Mr. Hj really cares, thank you, Mr. Hj

originalText.text: Sedikit saran baiknya harus selalu dicek tingkat kebersihan toilet, untuk Kamar sangat bagus sesuai standar. Dan emang mungkin Karena OYO ini Super lama proses booking dan pembayaran yang tidak langsung masuk ke sistem partnerny jadi saya harus nunggu dulu sampai ada verifikasi pembayaran telah masuk. Untuk pemilikny pak hj sangat peduli terimakasih pak hj

text.text: This pandemic rarely makes people stay here, so yesterday it was a bit quiet. There is a pool but it has turned into a fish pond. There are many choices of rooms from non-AC to AC. The service is good, friendly. The toilet water is clean. Close to the mosque, although inside. Strategically located in the center of Banjar City.

originalText.text: Pandemi ini jarang yang nginep di sini, jadi kemarin aga sepi. Ada kolam tapi berubah jadi kolam ikan. Kamar nya banyak pilihan dari yang non ac sampai AC. Layanan nya bagus, ramah. Air toilet nya bersih. Dekat dengan masjid, meskipun di dalam yang. Strategis di pusat Kota Banjar.

text.text: Thank God the place is comfortable and cool, it's just like the swimming pool has become a fish pond because of the effects of the pandemic, right? Booking using NgOYO is really annoying, thank you, Mr. Hjny, when I've booked, there's no notification yet.

originalText.text: Alhamdulillah tempatny nyaman adem , hanya seperti kolam renangny jadi kolam ikan karena efek pandemi ya ? Pemesanan pakai NgOYO Emang Ngeseliin kasih pak hjny masa udh booking belum ada notifikasi
